activities:
We will be receiving personal information of client organizations' potential, current, and former employees, including but not limited to name, birth date, gender, phone number, dates of employment, salary, and employment performance rating. This information is entered into our secured database and is accessible to third-party teleresearchers for the purpose of conducting attraction, incumbent, and terminate interviews.  
Additionally, residents of the EU may voluntarily submit personal information on our website for the purpose of attaining further information about our services.
eucountries: Austria, Denmark, France, Germany, Netherlands, Norway, United Kingdom
